headline: Jim Cramer on American Express: “I Think That Company’s Great”
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed recently. Cramer showed a positive sentiment toward the company, as he said: “Over the past few weeks, it looks like the experiential economy ain’t what it used to be… When you put it all together, it paints an increasingly negative picture of the […]

headline: American Express (AXP) Upgraded to Hold After Strong Quarterly Performance and Card Launch
summary: American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) ranks among the best financial stocks to buy according to billionaire Ken Fisher. Freedom Capital Markets boosted its price target for American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) from $280 to $325 on October 24 after the company’s third-quarter 2025 results, upgrading the stock from Sell to Hold. For the third quarter of 2025, […]
